data_description.base_url: The URL of your Mastodon instance.

deprecated_yaml.title: Mastodon YAML notify configuration imported
deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring Mastodon notify using YAML is being removed.
Remove the YAML notify configuration and restart Home Assistant.

import_aborted.title: Import aborted
import_aborted.description:
Configuring Mastodon using YAML is being removed.
The import was aborted, due to an existing config entry being the same as the data being imported in the YAML. Remove the YAML notify configuration and restart Home Assistant. Please use the UI to configure Mastodon.

import_failed.title: Failed to import
import_failed.description:
Failed to import the configuration for Mastodon.
Please use the UI to configure Mastodon. Don't forget to delete the YAML configuration.
